languages.text: "Это нутро жизнь может не только давать, но и забирать. Особенно если кому-то понравятся твои сапоги".
"This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."
languages.original_text: "Это нутро жизнь может не только давать, но и забирать. Особенно если кому-то понравятся твои сапоги".

traits.locale_text: "This core can take a life too. Especially if someone around here fancies the look of your boots."
"This core can take a life too. Especially if someone around here fancies the look of your boots."
"This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."

languages.text: "Dieser Kern kann ebenso leicht ein Leben nehmen, insbesondere, wenn jemand hier Gefallen an Euren Stiefeln findet."
languages.original_text: "This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Kern kann ebenso leicht ein Leben nehmen, insbesondere, wenn jemand hier Gefallen an Euren Stiefeln findet."

languages.text: « Ce cœur battant donne la vie aussi facilement qu'il la prend, surtout si quelqu'un dans les parages en vient à convoiter vos bottes. »
languages.original_text: "This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."

traits.locale_text: « Ce cœur battant donne la vie aussi facilement qu'il la prend, surtout si quelqu'un dans les parages en vient à convoiter vos bottes. »

languages.text: «El mismo núcleo puede cobrarse una vida, especialmente si alguien de por aquí se interesa por las botas que uno lleva».
languages.original_text: "This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."

traits.locale_text: «El mismo núcleo puede cobrarse una vida, especialmente si alguien de por aquí se interesa por las botas que uno lleva».

languages.text: 「この核は人の命も簡単に奪うことができる。特に、お前のブーツを気に入ったやつがいたらな」
languages.original_text: "This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."

traits.locale_text: 「この核は人の命も簡単に奪うことができる。特に、お前のブーツを気に入ったやつがいたらな」

languages.text: “因为这个核心同样可能会轻而易举地要了你的命，尤其是有人觉得你的靴子很漂亮的时候。”
languages.original_text: "This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."

traits.locale_text: “因为这个核心同样可能会轻而易举地要了你的命，尤其是有人觉得你的靴子很漂亮的时候。”

languages.original_text: "This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."

languages.text: "Bu çekirdek de rahatlıkla can alabilir. Hele ki etraftaki birileri çizmelerine göz koyduysa..."
languages.original_text: "This core can just as easily take a life too, especially if someone around here takes a fancy to your boots."
